overview: The main character of this work is Karen Kaede, who is known by the nickname of Maple! ! A beautiful girl with overwhelming beauty and perfect proportions that is second to none! ! Even though she is beautiful, she is loved for her unpretentious and mischievous humanity. In order to bring out the true charm of Karen Kaede, a photography team set up a location in the tropical island of Bali. The brilliantly sparkling sun of the southern island, the green of the trees, the white clouds and the blue water surface, the lively expression while feeling the great outdoors is the best! ! Interviews and costumes unique to image works are also enriched, and Neko Karen who speaks cat language is a must-listen! ! Karen Kaede, a beautiful girl filled with a refreshing feeling like a gentle breeze blowing in the middle of summer, completes the masterpiece here! !
title: Karen Midsummer Breeze Karen Kaede
